question.title: Bookshelf
question.text: Define a method called book that takes three inputs: Turtle t, double length and double width to use Turtle to draw a book with length and width of your choice. Define a method called shelf to draw a 100x50 rectangle. In your main method, use the two methods you defined, draw the following diagram: (The sizes of the books are: 20x16, 40x24, 35x12, 15x13, 25x10, 13x15, respectively.)
